description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ccttk","text":"Here, we provide a detailed protocol for differentiation of human induced pluripotent stem cell derived neural progenitor cells into astrocytes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

ownership_history.name: Jacob Marsh
ownership_history.affiliation: Washington University in Saint Louis - WUSTL (MO)

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6eah2","text":"Prepare astrocyte medium (ScienCell Astrocyte Medium #1801) by adding FBS, antibiotic, and astrocyte growth supplement to basal media. All components are provided in ScienCell Astrocyte Medium #1801 kit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcnqa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpq95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":74},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":112}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4n1dn","text":"Note: Fully prepared media should be used within two weeks when stored at  , but can be aliquoted and stored at   for several months. Alternatively, aliquot the supplements and prepare smaller volumes of complete media, if desired. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c381h","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"3520197050DE11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"1":{"data":{"guid":"4150106050DE11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"-20","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kd17","text":"Prior to starting, NPCs are cultured in one well of a six well plate until they reach 70% confluency ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj6cn","text":"Prepare wells/plates/dishes to be used for the differentiation process with Matrigel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amhdi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cu63c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":62}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4vnpd","text":"For reference, we coat a single well of a six well plate with   of Matrigel ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8q53q","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"1","guid":"070C075050DF11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","unit":2},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"begtl","text":"Remove media from NPCs and replace with   Accutase ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bcj2r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","guid":"E477CB7050DE11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k05c","text":"Incubate at   for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ghnj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1BE16EE050DF11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"2051733050DF11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2udlb","text":"Tap the plate to dissociate the cells and add   of room temperature DMEM/F12 and collect cells into a   tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7pubf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","guid":"2D1E1F5050DF11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","guid":"480888A050DF11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3h3tv","text":"Count the number of cells and move the required volume to a new   tube. Use the table below as a guide for the number of cells to plate into specific vessels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f958s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fntm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4sp43","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","guid":"6CDF1C9250E011EB97570A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Plate Size","# of Cells","Volume of Media"],"colWidths":["118","118","118"],"data":[["6-well plate","60,000/well","2mL/well"],["24-well plate","15,000/well","500uL/well"],["10cm dish","360,000","10mL"]],"guid":"CB0A6B9050E611EBBF274B088AE359EF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["6-well plate","60,000/well","2mL/well"],["24-well plate","15,000/well","500uL/well"],["10cm dish","360,000","10mL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3lrht","text":"Centrifuge the required volume at 750-800 rpm for 5 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vk1a","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and resuspend the cell pellet in NPC medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kum2","text":"Remove NPC media and replace with equivalent volume of complete astrocyte medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: NPC to Astrocyte Differentiation - Day 4 and Onward
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bqlk","text":"Change media every 2-3 days for 30 days and passage with Accutase, centrifuge at 750-800 rpm for 10 minutes and re-plate on a Matrigel coated plate whenever culture becomes 100% confluent ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: NPC to Astrocyte Differentiation - Day 4 and Onward
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9kmp1","text":"Within the first 30 days, keep the number of cells per well low to aid in differentiation ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: NPC to Astrocyte Differentiation - Day 4 and Onward
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8s6vi","text":"After 30 days, cells should be \u003e98% positive for S100b. Some lines may express high levels of GFAP, others will not. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"datda","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vvke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ig4q","text":"After full differentiation, cell confluency/number at passage is no longer important. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aeggq","text":"Dissociate cells with Accutase and collect in complete astrocyte medium in a 15mL conical tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg9ql","text":"Spin cells at 750-800 rpm for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsmm4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fun0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9jj04","text":"The slower spinning speed helps to reduce the percentage of cell death ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8aqii","text":"Aspirate media from pellet and resuspend in freezing media (50% complete astrocyte media, 40% FBS, 10% DMSO)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hnjt","text":"Transfer cell suspension to cryovials and place in -80C for 24-48 hours before transferring to liquid nitrogen for long-term storage ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj6cn","text":"Prepare wells/plates/dishes to be used for the differentiation process with Matrigel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"amhdi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cu63c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":62}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4vnpd","text":"For reference, we coat a single well of a six well plate with   of Matrigel ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8q53q","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"1","guid":"070C075050DF11EBBF274B088AE359EF","id":0,"label":"","unit":2},"mutability":"","type":"amount"}}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e95lu","text":"Add 9mL of complete astrocyte medium to a 15mL conical tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"38b7s","text":"Thaw frozen vial by swirling in water-bath at 37C for 60-90 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9fe0k","text":"Add thawed cells to 15mL conical tube containing astrocyte medium ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2495o","text":"Spin conical tube at 750-800 rpm for 10 minutes to pellet cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1llcp","text":"Aspirate media from cell pellet and replace with 2mL of complete astrocyte medium ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"tg4t","text":"Transfer cell suspension to Matrigel coated plate and incubate at 37C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: NPC to Astrocyte Differentiation
